attributes.additional_details:
With Cannabis legalisation becoming a more heated debate, it is time that UK politicians finally except that the general public can have their say.

In the United states, many states have gone green with a multitude of positive effects following the change.  Although we are different from our friends in many ways, we can learn from the positive effects cannabis legalisation has had.

Our NHS is crippled and the revenue produced from legalisation will inject billions of pounds into the system, more than enough money to cover any negative effects that the NHS may have may have to deal with.

Education and benefits for non smokers is the way to make people stop, not by criminalising them

So many uses and so overdue

GIVE CHOICE, REDUCE CRIME, GO GREEN!
